title: Meet Me
info: A website built with HTML displays my interests and hobbies using advanced CSS animations and SCSS

title: Brainastra
info: A study platform for students to watch live lectures, with stats of attendance and concentration for instructors and admin.

title: Your Friend Website
info: A landing page for Your Friend Initiative. It is a React website where people can book an appointment with the therapist, and schools can hire them as counselors.

title: Music Generation
info: A Machine Learning (LSTM) model, utilizing existing music files to generate new music files.

title: Twitter Gender Classification
info: It is an Ensemble model that classifies the owner of the tweets as male or female.

title: Rob-Oto
info: It is an Ensemble model that classifies the owner of the tweets as male or female.

title: Login/Register
info: React template for login and register page.

title: Bookify
info: A MERN stack site for bookworms where they can connect with previous readers of a particular book while staying anonymous.

title: Scoops&Cones
info: An e-commerce website for an ice cream shop built using Next.js.

title: Omnifood
info: An e-commerce website for an ice cream shop built using Next.js.
